Subject: Security Update – EPP Server Hotfix #1.1 – Important Security Updates persistent after installing
Description:
We are attempting to patch our Endpoint Protector server with the hotfix provided through the Live Update feature.

After installing the update, the system states that update was successful but when we check for updates again, the hotfix reappears. We've tried to reinstall it a number of times with the same result. Could you please advise?

Thank you,

Security Update – EPP Server Hotfix #1.1 – Important Security Updates for EPP Server (HWA-EPP4-U8800)
Solution_Comment__c: The update was successfully applied, but the patch was still available in the Live update page
Account_Name__c: Los Angeles Police Federal Credit Union
